00050 /// @brief File opening options
00051 enum fileoptions_t
00052 {
00053	 FileOption_Nothing,
00054	 FileOption_Recursive,		   ///< Browse folders recursively
00055 	FileOption_Close,			   ///< Close all files before open
00056 	FileOption_Max
00057 };

00075	 //Files
00076 		/// Open one or more files and collect information about them (technical information and tags)
00077 		/// @brief Open files
00078 		/// @param File Full name of file(s) to open \n
00079 		///			 or Full name of folder(s) to open \n
00080 		///			 (if multiple names, names must be separated by "|")
00081 		/// @param Options : FileOption_Recursive = Recursive mode for folders \n
00082 		///				  FileOption_Close = Close all already opened files before
00083 		/// @retval Number of files successfuly added
00084 	int Open (const MediaInfo_String &File, const fileoptions_t Options=FileOption_Nothing);
00085 		/// Open a stream (Begin and end of the stream) and collect information about it (technical information and tags)
00086 		/// @brief Open a stream
00087 		/// @param Begin First bytes of the stream
00088 		/// @param Begin_Size Size of Begin
00089 		/// @param End Last bytes of the stream
00090 		/// @param End_Size Size of End
00091 		/// @retval 0 File not opened
00092 		/// @retval 1 File opened
00093 	int Open (const unsigned char* Begin, size_t Begin_Size, const unsigned char* End=NULL, size_t End_Size=NULL);
00094 		/// Save the file opened before with Open() (modifications of tags)
00095 		/// @brief Save the file
00096 		/// @param FilePos File position \n
00097 		///		(you can know the position in searching the filename with MediaInfoList::Get(FilePos, 0, 0, "CompleteName") )
00098 		/// @retval 0 failed
00099 		/// @retval 1 suceed
00100 	int Save (unsigned int FilePos);
00101 		/// Save all files opened before with Open() (modifications of tags)
00102 		/// @brief Save all files
00103 		/// @retval Count of files saved
00104 	//int Save_All ();
00105 		/// Close the file opened before with Open() (without saving)
00106 		/// @brief Close the file
00107 		/// @warning without have saved before, modifications are lost
00108 		/// @remarks All positions of files upper than FilePos are shifted
00109 		/// @retval >=0 number of files saved
00110 	void Close (unsigned int FilePos);
00111 		/// Close all files files opened before with Open() (without saving)
00112 		/// @brief Close all file
00113 		/// @warning without have saved before, modifications are lost
00114 	//void Close_All ();

00128	 //Get
00129 		/// Get a piece of information about a file (parameter is an integer)
00130 		/// @brief Get a piece of information about a file (parameter is an integer)
00131 		/// @param FilePos File position \n
00132 		///		(you can know the position in searching the filename with MediaInfoList::Get(FilePos, 0, 0, "CompleteName") )
00133 		/// @param StreamKind Kind of stream (general, video, audio...)
00134 		/// @param StreamNumber Stream number in Kind of stream (first, second...)
00135 		/// @param Parameter Parameter you are looking for in the stream (Codec, width, bitrate...), in integer format (first parameter, second parameter...)
00136 		/// @param KindOfInfo Kind of information you want about the parameter (the text, the measure, the help...)
00137 		/// @return a string about information you search \n
00138 		///		 an empty string if there is a problem
00139 	MediaInfo_String Get (unsigned int FilePos, stream_t StreamKind, unsigned int StreamNumber, unsigned int Parameter, info_t KindOfInfo=Info_Text); //Get info, FilePos=File position, StreamKind=General video audio text chapter, StreamNumber=stream number, PosInStream=parameter you want, KindOfInfo=name, text, measure, options, name (language), measure (language), info, how to
00140 		/// Get a piece of information about a file (parameter is a string)
00141 		/// @brief Get a piece of information about a file (parameter is a string)
00142 		/// @param FilePos File position \n
00143 		///		(you can know the position in searching the filename with MediaInfoList::Get(FilePos, 0, 0, "CompleteName") )
00144 		/// @param StreamKind Kind of stream (general, video, audio...)
00145 		/// @param StreamNumber Stream number in Kind of stream (first, second...)
00146 		/// @param Parameter Parameter you are looking for in the stream (Codec, width, bitrate...), in string format ("Codec", "Width"...) \n
00147 		///		See Info_Parameters() to have the full list
00148 		/// @param KindOfInfo Kind of information you want about the parameter (the text, the measure, the help...)
00149 		/// @param KindOfSearch Where to look for the parameter
00150 		/// @return a string about information you search \n
00151 		///		 an empty string if there is a problem
00152 	MediaInfo_String Get (unsigned int FilePos, stream_t StreamKind, unsigned int StreamNumber, const MediaInfo_String &Parameter, info_t KindOfInfo=Info_Text, info_t KindOfSearch=Info_Name); //Get info, FilePos=File position, StreamKind=General video audio text chapter, StreamNumber=stream number, PosInStream=parameter you want, KindOfInfo=name text measure options name(language) measure(language) information how to, KindOfSearch=which Kind Of information Parameter must be searched?
00153

00155 		/// Set a piece of information about a file (parameter is an int)
00156 		/// @brief Set a piece of information about a file (parameter is an int)
00157 		/// @param FilePos File position \n
00158 		///		(you can know the position in searching the filename with MediaInfoList::Get(FilePos, 0, 0, "CompleteName") )
00159 		/// @param StreamKind Kind of stream (general, video, audio...)
00160 		/// @param StreamNumber Stream number in Kind of stream (first, second...)
00161 		/// @param Parameter Parameter you are looking for in the stream (Codec, width, bitrate...), in integer format (first parameter, second parameter...)
00162 		/// @param OldValue The old value of the parameter \n if OldValue is empty and ToSet is filled : tag is added \n if OldValue is filled and ToSet is filled : tag is replaced \n if OldValue is filled and ToSet is empty : tag is deleted
00163 		/// @retval >=0 suceed
00164 		/// @retval <0 failed
00165 	int Set (const MediaInfo_String &ToSet, unsigned int FilePos, stream_t StreamKind, unsigned int StreamNumber, unsigned int Parameter, const MediaInfo_String &OldValue=_T("")); //Get info, FilePos=File position, StreamKind=General video audio text chapter, StreamNumber=stream number, PosInStream=parameter you want, KindOfInfo=name, text, measure, options name(language) measure(language) information how to
00166 		/// @brief Get information about a file (parameter is a string)
00167 		/// @param FilePos File position \n
00168 		///		(you can know the position in searching the filename with MediaInfoList::Get(FilePos, 0, 0, "CompleteName") )
00169 		/// @param StreamKind Kind of stream (general, video, audio...)
00170 		/// @param StreamNumber Stream number in Kind of stream (first, second...)
00171 		/// @param Parameter Parameter you are looking for in the stream (Codec, width, bitrate...), in string format ("Codec", "Width"...) \n
00172 		///		See Info_Parameters() to have the full list
00173 		/// @param OldValue The old value of the parameter \n if OldValue is empty and ToSet is filled : tag is added \n if OldValue is filled and ToSet is filled : tag is replaced \n if OldValue is filled and ToSet is empty : tag is deleted
00174 		/// @retval >=0 suceed
00175 		/// @retval <0 failed
00176 	int Set (const MediaInfo_String &ToSet, unsigned int FilePos, stream_t StreamKind, unsigned int StreamNumber, const MediaInfo_String &Parameter, const MediaInfo_String &OldValue=_T("")); //Get info, FilePos=File position, StreamKind=General video audio text chapter, StreamNumber=stream number, PosInStream=parameter you want, KindOfInfo=name text measure options name (language) measure (language) information how to, KindOfSearch=which Kind Of information Parameter must be searched?
00177
00178	 //Info
00179 		/// Configure or get information about MediaInfoLib
00180 		/// @param Option The name of option
00181 		/// @param Value The value of option
00182 		/// @return Depend of the option : by default "" (nothing) means No, other means Yes
00183 		/// @post Known options are : \n
00184 		///	   * (NOT IMPLEMENTED YET) "BlockMethod" : Configure when Open Method must return (default or not command not understood : "1") \n
00185 		///				 "0" : Immediatly \n
00186 		///				 "1" : After geting local information \n
00187 		///				 "2" : When user interaction is needed, or whan Internet information is get
00188 		///	   * "Complete" : For debug, configure if MediaInfoLib::Inform() show all information (doesn't care of InfoOption_NoShow tag) : shows all information if true, shows only useful for user information if false (No by default)\n
00189 		///	   * "Complete_Get" : return the state of "Complete" \n
00190 		///	   * "Language" : Configure language (default language, and this object); Value is Description of language (format : "Column1;Colum2\n...) \n
00191 		///				 Column 1 : Unique name ("Bytes", "Title") \n
00192 		///				 Column 2 : translation ("Octets", "Titre") \n
00193 		///	   * "Language_Update" : Configure language of this object only (for optimisation); Value is Description of language (format : "Column1;Colum2\n...) \n
00194 		///				 Column 1 : Unique name ("Bytes", "Title") \n
00195 		///				 Column 2 : translation ("Octets", "Titre") \n
00196 		///	   * "Inform" : Configure custom text, See MediaInfoLib::Inform() function; Description of views (format : "Column1;Colum2...) \n
00197 		///				 Column 1 : code (11 lines : "General", "Video", "Audio", "Text", "Chapters", "Images", "Begin", "End", "Page_Begin", "Page_Middle", "Page_End") \n
00198 		///				 Column 2 : The text to show (exemple : "Audio : %FileName% is at %BitRate/String%") \n
00199 		///	   * "Inform_Get" : Get custom text\n
00200 		///	   * (NOT IMPLEMENTED YET) "TagSeparator" : Configure the separator if there are multiple same tags (" | " by default)\n
00201 		///	   * (NOT IMPLEMENTED YET) "TagSeparator_Get" : return the state of "TagSeparator" \n
00202 		///	   * (NOT IMPLEMENTED YET) "Internet" : Authorize Internet connection (Yes by default)
00203 		///	   * (NOT IMPLEMENTED YET) "Internet_Title_Get" : When State=5000, give all possible titles for this file (one per line) \n
00204 		///				 Form : Author TagSeparator Title TagSeparator Year\n...
00205 		///	   * (NOT IMPLEMENTED YET) "Internet_Title_Set" : Set the Good title (same as given by Internet_Title_Get) \n
00206 		///				 Form : Author TagSeparator Title TagSeparator Year
00207 		///	   * "Info_Parameters" : Information about what are known unique names for parameters \n
00208 		///	   * "Info_Parameters_CSV" : Information about what are known unique names for parameters, in CSV format \n
00209 		///	   * "Info_Capacities" : Information about which parameters per format are supported \n
00210 		///	   * "Info_Codecs" : Information about which codec is known \n
00211 		///	   * "Info_Version" : Information about the version of MediaInfoLib
00212 	MediaInfo_String		Option (const MediaInfo_String &Option, const MediaInfo_String &Value=MediaInfo_String(_T("")));
00213	 static MediaInfo_String Option_Static (const MediaInfo_String &Option, const MediaInfo_String &Value=MediaInfo_String(_T("")));
00214 		/// @brief (NOT IMPLEMENTED YET) Get the state of the library
00215 		/// @retval <1000 No information is available for the file yet
00216 		/// @retval >=1000_<5000 Only local (into the file) information is available, getting Internet information (titles only) is no finished yet
00217 		/// @retval 5000 (only if Internet connection is accepted) User interaction is needed (use Option() with "Internet_Title_Get") \n
00218 		///			  Warning : even there is only one possible, user interaction (or the software) is needed
00219 		/// @retval >5000<=10000 Only local (into the file) information is available, getting Internet information (all) is no finished yet
00220 		/// @retval <10000 Done
00221 	int					 State_Get ();
00222 		/// @brief Count of streams, or count of piece of information in this stream
00223 		/// @param FilePos File position \n
00224 		///		(you can know the position in searching the filename with MediaInfoList::Get(FilePos, 0, 0, "CompleteName") )
00225 		/// @param StreamKind Kind of stream (general, video, audio...)
00226 		/// @param StreamNumber Stream number in this kind of stream (first, second...)
00227 	int					 Count_Get (unsigned int FilePos, stream_t StreamKind, unsigned int StreamNumber=-1);
00228 		/// @brief Get the count of opened files
00229 		/// @return Count of files opened
00230 	int					 Count_Get ();
00231
00232 private :
00233	 std::vector <MediaInfo*> Info;
00234	 WxThread* Thread;
00235	 int BlockMethod; //Open() return : 0=immedialtly, 1=after local info, 2=when user interaction is needed
00236
00237 };
